document_data.caption: Bromdurr posing for a portrait.
document_data.name: Bromdurr Tathen
document_data.mainbody: '''Bromdurr Tathen''' was a mercenary recruiter in [[Amn]].
document_data.Activities: Bromdurr was a leading member ([[Boar's Head]]) of the [[Order of the Blue Boar]]. He was an expert of naval operations. He had a ship and, if needed, happily sailed for battle.
document_data.History: Bromdurr saved his hometown of [[Memnon]] in [[Calimshan]] from a pirate attack, gaining some fame. Later, he helped built the navy of Calimsham.
